name: Azzurro 8Bit Jam
overview: You don't know the rock pub Azzurro? Rock music, music videos... the best nightlife!... without forgetting the devilish championships of speed and precision in the noble art of drinking. Will you be able to follow the rhythm and drink the colors according to the indicated sequence? Become the king of the rockiest night with Azzurro 8-Bit Jam! The moment has arrived. You must put all your metal senses at the service of your mental agility and speed. At the beginning of each challenge there is a sequence of colors. You must drink as many rounds as indicated on the round counter, following this sequence of colors strictly.
